name: P1: Bike Prototype
description:
Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move in each cardinal direction
  • Space/Z when next to the bike to pick it up and ride it
  • Turn really hard to dismount the bike

"Bike Prototype" is essentially what it says on the tin — a short prototype regarding interfacing with weird controls, and an exercise in concise game feel and slippery movement.

All assets and programming by me.
